mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (REV_NUM, BO_NUM, AC_TITLE, ROOM_NUM, CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{rev_Num}, #{bo_Num}, #{ac_Title}, #{room_Num}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT REV_NUM, BO_NUM, AC_TITLE, ROOM_NUM, CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, UPDATE_DATE FROM review WHERE REV_NUM = #{rev_Num}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET BO_NUM = #{bo_Num}, AC_TITLE = #{ac_Title}, ROOM_NUM = #{room_Num}, CONTENT = #{content}, REVIEW_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REV_NUM = #{rev_Num}
mapper.select: select r.rev_num, b.email_id, r.room_num, r.content, r.update_Date from review r left join booking b on b.bo_num=r.bo_num
